info.title: Meta Cloud API
info.description: API documentation for WhatsApp Cloud API

tags.description: API documentation for WhatsApp message templates

tags.description: API endpoints for uploading, retrieving, and managing WhatsApp media files

tags.description: API endpoints for creating and managing WhatsApp QR codes

tags.description: API endpoints for WhatsApp Business Account (WABA) management

tags.description: API endpoints for managing and verifying WhatsApp business phone numbers

tags.description: API endpoints for registering and deregistering WhatsApp phone numbers

tags.description: API endpoints for managing WhatsApp business encryption keys

tags.description: API endpoints for configuring two-step verification for WhatsApp business accounts

tags.name: Flow
tags.description: API endpoints for creating and managing WhatsApp flows, including flow metadata, assets, and validation

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Meta Cloud API

PhoneNumberId.name: Phone-Number-Id
PhoneNumberId.description: WhatsApp phone number ID (WA_PHONE_NUMBER_ID) - Required for most API operations

BusinessAccountId.name: Business-Account-Id
BusinessAccountId.description: WhatsApp business account ID (WA_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID) - Required for WABA and some template operations

ApiVersion.name: Api-Version
ApiVersion.description: Meta Cloud API version (CLOUD_API_VERSION) - Optional, will use default if not provided

score.description: Quality rating of the phone number

level.description: Throughput level for the phone number

display_phone_number.description: The formatted phone number for display

id.description: Unique identifier for the phone number

quality_rating.description: Quality rating of the phone number

is_official_business_account.description: Whether this is an official business account

is_on_biz_app.description: Whether this number is on WhatsApp Business app

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

deep_link_url.description: Deep link URL for the QR code

FacebookError.description: Error response from Meta Cloud API

error_data.description: Additional error data for WhatsApp errors

error_message.example: Flows Migration Error: Flow with the same name exists in destination WABA.

file_size.description: Size of the media file in bytes

MessageResponse.description: Response from sending a WhatsApp message

clone_flow_id.description: ID of source Flow to clone

publish.description: Indicates whether Flow should also get published

post.summary: Send a message (unified endpoint supporting all message types)

parameters.name: businessNumberId
parameters.description: The ID of the business phone number

type.description: The type of message to send

to.description: The WhatsApp ID (phone number) of the recipient

replyMessageId.description: Optional message ID to reply to

audio.description: Audio message properties (required when type is 'audio')

id.description: The media object ID from Meta servers

link.description: HTTP/HTTPS URL of the audio file. Content-Type must be audio/aac, audio/mp4, audio/mpeg, audio/amr, or audio/ogg

contacts.description: Contacts message properties (required when type is 'contacts')

document.description: Document message properties (required when type is 'document')

id.description: The media object ID from Meta servers

image.description: Image message properties (required when type is 'image')

id.description: The media object ID from Meta servers

interactive.description: Interactive message properties (required when type is 'interactive')

location.description: Location message properties (required when type is 'location')

sticker.description: Sticker message properties (required when type is 'sticker')

id.description: The media object ID from Meta servers

template.description: Template message properties (required when type is 'template')

text.description: Text message properties (required when type is 'text')

video.description: Video message properties (required when type is 'video')

id.description: The media object ID from Meta servers

text.body: Hello, this is a text message

body.text: Tap the button below to see available dates.

post.summary: Subscribe to WABA or override webhook if override_callback_uri and verify_token provided

parameters.name: wabaId
parameters.description: The ID of the business account

override_callback_uri.description: The webhook URL. If provided with verify_token, acts as webhook override

verify_token.description: The verification token for the webhook. Required if override_callback_uri provided

200.description: Successfully subscribed to WABA or overrode webhook
